what: Trends of numbers of active substances
title: Trends of data contained in XML dumps of the PSMV
code: actives_by_category <- sapply(psmv_list, function(dm) {   actives_categories <- dm$products |>     ungroup() |>     left_join(dm$product_categories, by = join_by(wNbr)) |>     select(wNbr, category = category_de) |>     unique() |>     left_join(dm$ingredients, by = join_by(wNbr), relationship = "many-to-many") |>     dplyr::filter(type == "ACTIVE_INGREDIENT") |>     left_join(dm$substances, by = join_by(pk)) |>     select(pk, category, substance_de) |>     unique() |>     arrange(pk, substance_de, category)    n_actives <- actives_categories |>     select(pk) |>     unique() |>     nrow()    actives_categories |>     group_by(category) |>     summarise(n = n()) |>     arrange(desc(n))    n_tibble <- actives_categories |>     mutate(category = case_when(       grepl("Herbizid", category) ~ "Herbizid",       grepl("Fungizid", category) ~ "Fungizid",       grepl("Insektizid", category) ~ "Insektizid",       grepl("Saatbeizmittel", category) ~ "Saatbeizmittel",       grepl("Regulator", category) ~ "PGR",       grepl("Lebende Organismen", category) ~ "Organismen",       grepl("Akarizid", category) ~ "Akarizid",       .default = "Sonstige"     )) |>     group_by(category) |>     summarise(n = n()) |>     arrange(desc(n))    n <- n_tibble$n   names(n) <- n_tibble$category   n <- c(Total = n_actives, n)   return(n) }) kable(actives_by_category) actives_by_category_long <- actives_by_category |>   tibble::as_tibble(rownames = "Kategorie") |>   tidyr::pivot_longer(cols = where(is.numeric), names_to = "Jahr", values_to = "Anzahl") |>   ungroup() |>   group_by(Kategorie)  actives_by_category_long |>   ggplot(aes(Jahr, Anzahl, group = Kategorie, color = Kategorie)) +   geom_point() +   geom_line()

title: Building data objects from XML versions of the PSMV
text: process creating first version PSMV SQL database, information got lost exporting content Access versions PSMV received Agridea. Neither W-Numbers XML ids exported, instead new id_Uniqueproduct created, really unique. Therefore, package attempts import relevant data available XML dumps published BLW website R package, keeping referential integrity.

title: Building data objects from XML versions of the PSMV
text: Creating set tables PSMV XML file easy takes couple seconds complete.
code: time <- system.time(   {     psmv_current <- psmv_dm()   } ) ## ℹ Reading XML for 2023-11-01 ## ✔ No duplicated W-Numbers print(time) ##    user  system elapsed  ##  10.521   0.376  11.049 dm_draw(psmv_current) dm_flatten_to_tbl(psmv_current, ingredients) |>    select(wNbr, name, substance_de, percent, g_per_L) ## # A tibble: 2,822 × 5 ##    wNbr   name                        substance_de percent g_per_L ##    <chr>  <chr>                       <chr>        <chr>   <chr>   ##  1 1454   "Misto 12"                  Paraffinöl   99.1    "830.0" ##  2 1454-2 "Parafol"                   Paraffinöl   99.1    "830.0" ##  3 1526   "Zofal D"                   Paraffinöl   99.1    "830.0" ##  4 1526-1 "Capito Winterspritzmittel" Paraffinöl   99.1    "830.0" ##  5 1526-2 "Biorga Contra Winteröl"    Paraffinöl   99.1    "830.0" ##  6 1529   "Oléoc "                    Paraffinöl   99.1    "830.0" ##  7 1698   "Asulox"                    Asulam       33.2    "400.0" ##  8 18     "Thiovit Jet"               Schwefel     80.0    ""      ##  9 18-1   "Sufralo"                   Schwefel     80.0    ""      ## 10 18-2   "Capito Bio-Schwefel"       Schwefel     80.0    ""      ## # ℹ 2,812 more rows

text: date number giving year starting 2011 current year date publication length one character vector format YYYY-MM-DD remove_duplicates duplicates based wNbrs removed? keep deal product sections identical W-Numbers? default strategy 'keep' keeps last sets product sections. x psmv_dm object ... used

title: Create a dm object from an XML version of the PSMV — psmv_dm
text: dm object tables linked foreign keys pointing primary keys, .e. referential integrity.

title: Create a dm object from an XML version of the PSMV — psmv_dm
code: library(dm) #>  #> Attaching package: ‘dm’ #> The following object is masked from ‘package:stats’: #>  #>     filter psmv_2017 <- psmv_dm(2017) #> ℹ Reading XML for 2017-01-13 #> ✔ No duplicated W-Numbers print(psmv_2017) #> <psmv_dm> object for date: 2017-01-13  #>             products   product_categories    formulation_codes  #>                 2269                 4976                 2269  #>       danger_symbols                CodeS                CodeR  #>                 3400                10051                 6659  #>         signal_words           substances          ingredients  #>                  976                  534                 3618  #>                 uses    application_areas application_comments  #>                15642                15642                 7994  #>             cultures                pests          obligations  #>                24277                28729                45255  dm_examine_constraints(psmv_2017) #> Adding missing grouping variables: `pNbr` #> ℹ All constraints satisfied. # Show some information for products named 'Boxer' psmv_2017 |>   dm_filter(products = (name == "Boxer")) |>   dm_nrow() #>             products   product_categories    formulation_codes  #>                    2                    4                    2  #>       danger_symbols                CodeS                CodeR  #>                    4                    4                    8  #>         signal_words           substances          ingredients  #>                    2                    1                    2  #>                 uses    application_areas application_comments  #>                   14                   14                   16  #>             cultures                pests          obligations  #>                   24                   24                   70

title: Get Products from an XML version of the PSMV — psmv_xml_get_products
code: library(psmv) # The first PSMV from 2015 (2015-01-06) has a duplicate W-Number products_2015 <- psmv_xml_get(2015) |>   psmv_xml_get_products(verbose = TRUE) #> ℹ Reading XML for 2015-01-06 #> ! Removed product section(s) with duplicated W-Number(s) 6721 #> ✔ No duplicated W-Numbers  # Get current list of products psmv_xml_get_products() #> ℹ Reading XML for 2023-11-01 #> ✔ No duplicated W-Numbers #> # A tibble: 1,677 × 7 #> # Groups:   pNbr [1,100] #>     pNbr wNbr   name         exhaustionDeadline soldoutDeadline isSalePermission #>    <int> <chr>  <chr>        <chr>              <chr>           <chr>            #>  1    38 18     Thiovit Jet  ""                 ""              false            #>  2    38 18-1   Sufralo      ""                 ""              true             #>  3    38 18-2   Capito Bio-… ""                 ""              true             #>  4    38 18-3   Sanoplant S… ""                 ""              true             #>  5    38 18-4   Biorga Cont… ""                 ""              true             #>  6  1182 923    Divopan      ""                 ""              false            #>  7  1192 934    Trifolin     ""                 ""              false            #>  8  1263 986    Elosal Supra ""                 ""              false            #>  9  1865 1454   Misto 12     ""                 ""              false            #> 10  1865 1454-2 Parafol      ""                 ""              true             #> # ℹ 1,667 more rows #> # ℹ 1 more variable: terminationReason <chr>
